End Section 1
Start Section 2
About us
Tucked away in the chic neighborhood of South of Fifth, South Pointe Tavern has quickly become Miami’s Favorite Local Bar. Featuring the largest selection of spirits in Miami Beach, the concept is driven by seasonally curated cocktails, executed to perfection, and served in a cool, comfortable atmosphere.
The bar boasts 200+ Whiskeys and 80+ Tequilas. Our bartenders serve up crafty variations of classic cocktails like Old Fashioned, Negronis, Whiskey Bucks, Margaritas, and Highballs.
The Tavern’s menu features an artisanal menu with dishes like ceviches, crudos, pizzas, and a wide range of seasonal small and large plates like salads, entrees, and sandwiches. Our small plates are the perfect starter to any meal or a great late-night snack.
End Section 2
Start Section Custom
Opened in 2016, the space was designed to feel like home. With French bistro-style seating and lounge, nautical-inspired lighting, and exposed brick, South Pointe Tavern has earned the title of “The Cheers of South of Fifth”.
Those seeking a memorable event location look no further. South Pointe Tavern's lounge area features plush leather couches and the relaxed vibe your guests are sure to love. The walls are adorned with hanging guitars and shelves of classic books about music, art, and design. With 12 flat-screen TVs throughout and highly attentive staff, South Pointe Tavern is sure to set the stage for an unforgettable evening.
South Pointe Tavern is open 7 days a week from 9 am until 2 am. Breakfast is served from 9 am until 12 pm. The Tavern menu is served from 12 noon until 1 am. Come and enjoy Happy Hour, Monday-Friday from 5 pm-7 pm, offering discounts on all house wines by the glass, beer, and selected cocktails.
End Section Custom
Start Section 3

End Section 3
